comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: A Harvard man, Secretary of the National Chamber of Commerce, and Secretary of the National Civil Service Reform League; he married Isabel Montague Geer on Feb 19, 1915. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F10712FD3C5412...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an article on him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elliot_Hersey_Goodwin

comment.author: 68106170@N05
comment._content: My grandfather and Elliot Goodwin were friends and my father was named John Elliot Steinthal as a tribute to that friendship.
